Function.Name: GetAllTimeZonesWithDisplayName
Function.Description: Adds an item to a campaign activity.
Function.ReturnType: The collection of the timezonedefinition records.

Function.Name: LocalTimeFromUtcTime
Function.Description: Retrieves the local time for the specified Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
Function.ReturnType: The time that is represented as local time.

Function.Name: RetrieveAuditPartitionList
Function.Description: Retrieves the list of database partitions that are used to store audited history data.
Function.ReturnType: Collection of audit partition details.

Function.Name: RetrieveByTopIncidentProductKbArticle
Function.Description: Retrieves the top-ten articles about a specified product from the knowledge base of articles for your organization.
Function.ReturnType: Collection of articles about the specified product from the knowledge base of articles for your organization.

Function.Name: RetrieveByTopIncidentSubjectKbArticle
Function.Description: Retrieves the top-ten articles about a specified subject from the knowledge base of articles for your organization.
Function.ReturnType: Collection of knowledge base articles about the specified subject.

Function.Name: RetrieveExchangeRate
Function.Description: Retrieves the exchange rate.
Function.ReturnType: The exchange rate for the currency.

Function.Name: RetrieveFormattedImportJobResults
Function.Description: Retrieves the formatted results from an import job.

Parameters.Parameter: GUID of an import job. Required.

Function.ReturnType: The formatted results of the import job.

Function.Name: RetrieveOrganizationResources
Function.Description: Retrieves the resources that are used by an organization.
Function.ReturnType: The resources used by an organization.

Function.Name: RetrieveTeamPrivileges
Function.Description: Retrieves the privileges for a team.
Function.ReturnType: List of privileges that the team holds for a record.

Function.Name: RetrieveUserPrivileges
Function.Description: Retrieves the privileges a system user (user) has through his or her roles in the specified business unit.
Function.ReturnType: Array of privileges that the user holds.

Function.Name: RetrieveUserQueues
Function.Description: Retrieves all private queues of a specified user and optionally all public queues.

Parameters.Parameter: Specifies whether public queues should be included.

Function.ReturnType: Collection of queues.

Function.Name: RetrieveVersion
Function.Description: Retrieves the version number of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Server.
Function.ReturnType: The version number of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Server.

Function.Name: UtcTimeFromLocalTime
Function.Description: Retrieves the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the specified local time.
Function.ReturnType: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

Function.Name: WhoAmI
Function.Description: Retrieves the system user ID for the currently logged on user or the user under whose context the code is running.
Function.ReturnType: A complex type that contains the UserId, BusinessUnitId and OrganizationId.

Function.Name: CalculateTotalTimeIncident
Function.Description: Calculates the total time, in minutes, that you used while you worked on an incident (case).
Function.ReturnType: The total time, in minutes that you use when you work on an incident (case).

Function.Name: CheckPromoteEmail
Function.Description: Checks whether the incoming email message should be promoted to the Microsoft Dynamics CRM system.

Parameters.Parameter: The message ID that is contained in the email header.
Provides the direction of a mail checked for promotion for uniqueness.

Function.ReturnType: Provides a ShouldPromote value and ReasonCode to explain why the email should be promoted.

Function.Name: ExpandCalendar
Function.Description: Converts the calendar rules to an array of available time blocks for the specified period.

Parameters.Parameter: The start of the period to expand.
The end of the time period to expand.

Function.ReturnType: A set of time blocks with appointment information.

Function.Name: ExportFieldTranslation
Function.Description: Exports localizable fields values to a compressed file.
Function.ReturnType: The compressed file that represents the exported translation file.

Function.Name: GetTimeZoneCodeByLocalizedName
Function.Description: Retrieve the time zone code for the specified localized time zone name.

Parameters.Parameter: The localized name to search for.

Function.ReturnType: The time zone code that has the requested localized name.

Function.Name: RetrievePersonalWall
Function.Description: Retrieves pages of posts, including comments for each post, for all records that the calling user is following.

Parameters.Parameter: The number of posts per page
The number of comments per post.
The start date and time of the posts that you want to retrieve
The end date and time of the posts that you want to retrieve
A value that specifies the source of the post
A specific page of posts that is designated by its page number.

Function.ReturnType: The collection of posts with their associated comments and the calculated attribute values.

Function.Name: RetrievePrivilegeSet
Function.Description: Retrieve the set of privileges defined in the system.
Function.ReturnType: The resulting collection of privileges.

Function.Name: RetrieveMailboxTrackingFolders
Function.Description: Retrieves folder-based tracking rules for a user.

Parameters.Parameter: The mailbox ID of the user for which you want to retrieve the folder-based rules.

Function.ReturnType: The folder-based rule mapping for a user.
